author: Staff Reporter
title: 535 beds and 125 ventilators ready to meet medical emergency
description: A total of 535 beds in government and private hospitals and 125 ventilators are being readied to meet medical emergency arising out of spread of coronavirus (COVID-19).The Collector, A. Shanmuga Sunda
content:
A total of 535 beds in government and private hospitals and 125 ventilators are being readied to meet medical emergency arising out of spread of coronavirus (COVID-19).
